Html:
Hello all!

I'm following along with this tutorial using VS2015 and am at Chapter 4 "Data Access". I'm on page 49 where we've implemented the use of EF and am calling the Store/Index view so that the view returns real data from db instead of hard coded data. I believe I have followed all the steps properly but get this error when I call this view:

No Entity Framework provider found for the ADO.NET provider with invariant name 'System.Data.SqlServerCe.4.0'. Make sure the provider is registered in the 'entityFramework' section of the application config file.

The proj builds fine and I see EF and EF.SqlServer references in the Reference folder.

I'm at a loss and would appreciate any tips or suggestions.

Thanks!

(If it helps to see my attempt: https://github.com/RedBirdOBX/MVC-Music-Store/tree/DEV )
